pages.title: Shotogatana
pages.text: This is the Shotogatana.. This Elegant Weapon is obtained via repairing a broken Blade with a Weapon Repair Module at a smithing table..

pages.title: Ronin Skeleton
pages.text: This is the Ronin Skeleton, this enemy is a variant of the Skeleton which has a small chance to spawn instead of the normal variant.. When killed, it has a chance to drop: Broken Blade, Weapon Repair Module, Weapon Curve Module, One of It's Ronin Armor Pieces. Default Spawn Chance: 0.08 out of 1

pages.title: Tessen
pages.text: This is the Tessen.. This Deadly bladed War Fan is obtained via repairing a broken Fan Blade with a Weapon Repair Module at a smithing table!

pages.title: War Fan Pillager
pages.text: This is the War Fan Pillager, this enemy is a variant of the Pillager which has a small chance to spawn instead of the regular variant.. When killed, it has a chance to drop: Broken War Fan, Weapon Repair Module. Default Spawn Chance: 0.2 out of 1

pages.title: Tsume
pages.text: This is the Tsume.. The Tsume are a pair of deadly claws capable of slicing through the toughest armor! This can be obtained via repairing broken claws With A Weapon Repair Module at a smithing table!

pages.title: Clawed Zombie Villager
pages.text: This is the Clawed Zombie Villager, this enemy is a variant of the Zombie Villager which has a small chance to spawn instead of the regular variant.. When killed, it has a chance to drop: Broken Claws, Weapon Repair Module. Default Spawn Chance: 0.25 out of 1

pages.title: Arbiters Blade
pages.text: This is the Arbiters Blade.. This rare sword, giving courage to the one who wields it, is found from the $(o)Ancient Sword Shrine$()... A rare structure which contains a magical sword in stone...

pages.title: Ancient Sword Shrine
pages.text: Unlike The First Three Weapons, the $(i)$(o)Arbiter's Blade$() is a $(o)magical weapon of courage$().. Therefor cannot be crafter or easily found on an enemy. The Sword is instead found inside an $(o)Ancient Shrine$(), this shrine is only found in 5 biomes: $(i)$(o)Meadow, Cherry Grove, Bamboo Jungle, Jungle And Taiga.$()
